about_the_game: This is the original base 1.0 version of Rogue Planet: Reimagined. You can play it start to finish free of charge. But it is no longer fully canon. However it still stands on its own. Beware the lack of polish, and bugs. This demo is given as-is.

content_descriptors.notes: Flashing and bright lights, surreal and psychedelic visuals, frequent firefights and violent action, strong language, and blood and gore.

detailed_description: This is the original base 1.0 version of Rogue Planet: Reimagined. You can play it start to finish free of charge. But it is no longer fully canon. However it still stands on its own. Beware the lack of polish, and bugs. This demo is given as-is.
name: Rogue Planet 1: Golden Hour Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: If you have a toaster, this should run. In an as-is state. Expect bugs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: If you have a toaster, this should run. In an as-is state. Expect bugs.

short_description: This is the original base 1.0 version of Rogue Planet: Reimagined. You can play it start to finish free of charge.
